顕然: (けんぜん) - (adj-t,adv-to,adj-nari) (ant: 隠然) clear; manifest
顕界: (げんかい) - this world; present world (as opposed to the realm of the dead)
顕職: (けんしょく) - prominent or high post
顕花植物: (けんかしょくぶつ) - phanerogam; phanerogamous plant; phanerogamic plant; spermatophyte; flowering plant
顕要: (けんよう) - of great prominence or dignity
願い: (negai) - desejo, vontade, pedido, oração, petição, solicitação
願いごと: (ねがいごと) - wish; dream; prayer; one's desire
願い下げ: (ねがいさげ) - cancellation/withdrawal; asking to be excused/begging off/not taking/refusing
願い下げる: (ねがいさげる) - to withdraw a request
願い主: (ねがいぬし) - applicant; person who prays
願い事: (ねがいごと) - wish; dream; prayer; one's desire
願う: (negau) - desejar, querer, esperar; implorar, solicitar, suplicar, rezar; ter algo feito para si mesmo
願ったり叶ったり: (ねがったりかなったり) - everything working out as desired
願ってもない: (ねがってもない) - best one could ask for; just what one wants; welcome (news); heaven-sent
願っても無い: (ねがってもない) - best one could ask for; just what one wants; welcome (news); heaven-sent
願わくは: (ねがわくは) - I pray; I wish
願わくば: (ねがわくば) - I pray; I wish
願わくわ: (ねがわくわ) - (misspelling of 願わくは;ねがわくは)  I pray
願をかける: (がんをかける) - to make a wish (to a god)
願を掛ける: (がんをかける) - to make a wish (to a god)
願事: (ねがいごと) - wish; dream; prayer; one's desire
願人坊主: (がんにんぼうず) - priest who was also a street performer and performed prayers and other religious duties for the sake of other people
願力: (がんりき) - the power of prayer (in Buddhism)
願意: (がんい) - wish/hope/petition/request; (orig. meaning) object of an application/intent of a request
願掛: (がんがけ) - Shinto or Buddhist prayer
願掛け: (がんがけ) - Shinto or Buddhist prayer
願文: (がんもん) - Shinto or Buddhist prayer (read)
願書: (がんしょ) - written application or petition; application form
願望充足: (がんぼうじゅうそく) - wish fulfillment; wish fulfilment
願立て: (がんだて) - Shinto or Buddhist prayer
願解き: (がんほどき) - visiting a shrine or temple to give thanks for the fulfilment of a prayer
願酒: (がんしゅ) - praying at a temple or shrine for help to stop drinking
願面: (がんめん) - the front page of an application blank
顛末書: (てんまつしょ) - detailed written report; formal account (of steps taken in response to an incident, etc.)
顛覆: (てんぷく) - capsizing/overturn/turning over/upset; overthrow (e.g. a government)
類: (rui/tagu) - sort , kind, sort, type, class, genus, order, family; similar example, parallel, the like
類いする: (たぐいする) - to be equal to; to be as good as; to be a match for; to rival
類い希: (たぐいまれ) - unique; rare; exceptional; unparalleled; incomparable
類い稀: (たぐいまれ) - unique; rare; exceptional; unparalleled; incomparable
類える: (たぐえる) - to compare/to liken; to make (someone) accompany
類する: (るいする) - to be similar to
類は友を呼ぶ: (るいはともをよぶ) - birds of a feather flock together
類を見ない: (るいをみない) - unprecedented; unique; unparalleled
類似品: (るいじひん) - imitation; similar article; similar goods
類例: (るいれい) - similar instance; similar case; parallel case; analogy
類友: (るいとも) - hobby friend; friend gained through common interests or personality
類同: (るいどう) - similar; of the same type
類型: (るいけい) - type/pattern/shape/genre/breed; similar type/similar pattern
類型化: (るいけいか) - classifying in patterns; typification
類型的: (るいけいてき) - stereotyped; patterned; typical
類希: (たぐいまれ) - unique; rare; exceptional; unparalleled; incomparable
類形: (るいけい) - type/pattern/shape/genre/breed; similar type/similar pattern
類従: (るいじゅう) - assembling according to type; collection of items sorted by type
類感呪術: (るいかんじゅじゅつ) - sympathetic magic; homeopathic magic; imitative magic
類推推理: (るいすいすいり) - (yoji) reasoning by analogy; analogical inference; analogism
